text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga saltensis is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Argentina and Bolivia.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Prado, D. (1998). "Inga saltensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38213A10105473. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38213A10105473.en. Retrieved 21 December 2017.
